# Worker Service Provider App - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
Flutter-based worker/service provider mobile application with comprehensive job management, real-time tracking, and payment features.

## Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Flutter worker app with job management, location tracking, payments
- [ ] Scaffold the Project - Create Flutter project structure
- [ ] Customize the Project - Add all required features and screens
- [ ] Install Required Extensions - Dart & Flutter extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project - Run flutter pub get and resolve dependencies
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Not needed for Flutter
- [ ] Launch the Project - Guide user to run app
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Create README
